result.reason: The search box does not gain focus when selecting text with the mouse, which contradicts standard UI behavior and hinders quick editing.
result.approach: Override the OnMouseDown event in the MrngSearchBox control to explicitly call Focus(), ensuring the control is active for input when text is selected.
